articles.title: U.S. Ex-NBA Star Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
U.S. Ex-NBA Star Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Dennis Rodman, ex-player of the NBA of the U.S., and his party toured the Rungna Dolphinarium on Friday. 
					 The guests expressed deep impressions as they were briefed on the Dolphinarium on picturesque Rungna Islet.
					
					 They spent a good time watching dolphins dancing to the tune of cheerful music, jumping in group, spinning rings, jumping into the air and shaking hands with people.
					
					 Earlier, they also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Arch of Triumph.

articles.title: NBA Ex-player Leaves Here
articles.content:
NBA Ex-player Leaves Here
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Ex-player of the NBA of the U.S. Dennis Rodman left here Friday.
					 Seeing him off at the airport were Son Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the DPRK Olympic Committee, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Tree-planting Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Tree-planting Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Spring tree-planting started in the DPRK.
					 Working people and school youth and children across the country turned out in the patriotic work with a single mind to successfully embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism for turning the country into the people's paradise and a socialist fairyland in thick verdure on the occasion of March 2, the Tree-planting Day.
					
					 Meetings took place across the country on Friday to vow to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery, true to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's idea on land improvement.
					
					 Agricultural workers, school youth and children, working people and members of the women's union separately held meetings at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site, the Munsubong Revolutionary Site, Central Botanical Garden and the arboretum of the garden.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, commissions, ministries and national institutions, people of various circles and school youth and children.
					
					 Speeches followed reports there.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that President Kim Il Sung, together with general secretary Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, climbed Moran Hill in Pyongyang on March 2, Juche 35 (1946) and called for planting many trees on mountains.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, when he visited a unit of the People's Army in March last year, personally planted a tree he took there, they said, underscoring the need to turn the mountains and fields into thick and green socialist fairyland.
					
					 They called upon all people to turn out in the spring tree-planting campaign with one mind of ardent patriotism to plant and grow many trees in the country.
					
					 At the end of the meetings senior party and state officials planted trees with people of various circles and school youth and children.
					
					 On the same day officials, people and school youth and children also held similar meetings and planted trees in each province, city and county.

articles.title: DPRK Service Personnel Vow to Take Lead in Spring Tree Planting
articles.content:
DPRK Service Personnel Vow to Take Lead in Spring Tree Planting
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the DPRK are active in spring tree planting to turn the country into a socialist fairyland in thick verdure.
					 A meeting of the service personnel of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces was held Friday near the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. They vowed to thoroughly implement orders from the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), who called on soldiers to take the lead in turning the country into thick woodland and greenery. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Kyok Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, its First Vice Minister Hyon Chol Hae, its officials, KPA service personnel and students of military schools at all levels.
					
					 Speeches were made following the minister's report.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said Generalissimo Kim Jong Il put forward the KPA in the mass tree-planting movement, true to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung's intention of building a prosperous country.
					
					 Mapping out a grand plan of the land development, Kim Jong Un made sure that modern tree nurseries were built, and energetically led the work for spreading new species of lawn to the whole country, they said.
					
					 They called on all the service personnel to turn out in the tree planting, true to the intention of Kim Jong Un and fully display their patriotic enthusiasm.
					
					 After the meeting the participants planted trees around the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun with great care.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Algerian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Algerian President
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, on his birthday.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the Algerian president good health, happiness and greater success in his work for the stability, development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Wide Avenue for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Wide Avenue for National Reunification 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out as one in the nationwide patriotic struggle for national reunification with strong will to oppose outside aggressor forces and usher in a landmark phase in carving out the independent destiny of the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an editorial marking the 94th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising. 
					
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The March First Popular Uprising taught a bitter lesson that the popular masses should be led by an outstanding leader and they must build up their own powerful forces and launch an organized struggle in line with a correct strategy and tactics if they are to emerge victors in the struggle for the sovereignty of the nation and independence of the country. 
					
					 Korea was mercilessly trampled down by the Japanese imperialists a century ago but the DPRK has now emerged a political and military power and its people are demonstrating their dignity as an independent people whom no one dares provoke. The military and technical superiority is no longer monopoly of the imperialists and gone are the days never to return when the enemies could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with A-bombs. 
					
					 All Koreans should have transparent consciousness of independence and resolutely stand up against the U.S. hostile moves against the DPRK and wage a dynamic struggle for driving the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops out of south Korea. South Koreans should decisively frustrate such traitorous acts as hurting national interests in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 All Koreans should frustrate through concerted efforts the moves of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers to ignite a war against the DPRK as they bring the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula in violation of the independent right of the DPRK. 
					
					 All Koreans must unite close in the idea of "By our nation itself", foil the traitorous confrontation and war moves through a nationwide patriotic struggle for reunification and open up a new phase of national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes at Key Resolve, Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes at Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are typical ones for invading the DPRK and a test nuclear war as they are aimed to mount surprise "preemptive nuclear attack" on the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are the drills for a war against the DPRK, which have been systematically escalated with tinderbox of nuclear war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Through the joint military exercises the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have examined and rounded off in an overall way the rapid deployment of aggression forces in the Korean Peninsula and the posture for carrying out combined operations, while getting familiar with the capability to make a preemptive nuclear attack on the strategic depth and major strongholds in the DPRK.
					
					 Their provocative nature has been reinforced by the U.S. aggression policy towards the DPRK and the south Korean puppet forces, its lackeys.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are a grave military provocation and undisguised declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces seek to mislead the public opinion, describing them as "annual" and "defensive". With no rhetoric can the war-thirsty forces cover up the gravity and danger of the joint military exercises.
					
					 In case a new war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula due to reckless military provocation of aggressors, it is bound to lead to an all-out nuclear war. The DPRK can never allow the south Korean bellicose forces to seriously threaten it by force of arms in league with foreign forces and increase the danger of a nuclear war to extremes.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers had better stop such foolish adventure as jumping into fire with faggot on their back.

articles.title: DPRK Will Take Tougher Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Take Tougher Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- It is a traditional fighting mode of the DPRK and the militant spirit of its army and people to foil the reactionary offensive of the U.S. imperialists and their followers with a revolutionary offensive, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on to say:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the DPRK's armed forces for self-defense, though they were in their infancy after the country's liberation, frustrated the enemies' provocations and sabotages not only in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line but in different parts of the northern half of Korea, thus guaranteeing the peaceful environment and foundation of the republic with arms.
					
					  When the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces ignited a war, the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces delivered a merciless counterattack which led to their final victory.
					
					 Since then, the U.S. imperialists fabricated the incident of the armed spy ship Pueblo, the incident of the spy plane EC-121, the Panmunjom incident, etc., driving the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 At every incident, the army and people of the DPRK foiled the enemies' moves to invade it with a tougher counteraction, calling for responding to retaliation with retaliation and to an all-out war with an all-out war.
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation that had edged toward the worst phase came to a conclusion for the time being by the adoption of the agreed framework reached between the two countries in Geneva in October 1994 and a message of assurances the then U.S. President Clinton sent to Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists which set it as a goal to bring down the DPRK's system defaulted on the agreement and has persistently resorted to the moves to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 The DPRK declared the withdrawal from the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty which it had temporarily put on hold and the possession of nuclear weapons and conducted two rounds of underground nuclear test as part of measures for self-defense.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces are trying to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK, taking issue with its launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and the successful third nuclear test.
					
					 But their moves will meet a tougher revolutionary offensive of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Instead of any concession and retreat, the DPRK will take a more resolute counteraction which will culminate in its victory.

articles.title: Nationwide Anti-Japanese Action Called for
articles.content:
Nationwide Anti-Japanese Action Called for 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The north's Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation and the south's Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation of the Preparatory Committee for Joint National Events for Marking March 1 released a joint appeal Friday, 94th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 On March 1 94 years ago, the Korean people rose up in different parts of the country for actions for independence and liberation to retake the sovereignty of the country seized by the Japanese imperialists, defying their bayonets, the appeal said.
					
					 It added that decades have passed since the uprising but the trace of untold sufferings and disasters inflicted upon the Korean nation still remain on this land and Koreans have deep scar in the hearts.
					
					 Japan, however, is distorting history textbooks to beautify its crimes and cover up the truth, far from making sincere apology, repentance and reparation for the past historical crimes. It is asserting that Tok Islets, part of an inviolable territory of Korea, is its land and has been engrossed in making provocations for invasion, the appeal said. 
					
					 All the Koreans, with towering anger at the Japanese imperialists who massacred Koreans and plundered the land of Korea after occupying it, bitterly denounce the Japanese authorities for not making due apology, repentance and reparation, the appeal added.
					
					 It called once again on all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to wage nationwide anti-Japanese movement on the occasion of the 94th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising in order to wrest apology, repentance and reparation from Japan.
					
					 All the Koreans will follow through on the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in unity and expand the wide movement for national reconciliation and independent and peaceful reunification, it stressed.
					
					 The appeal in the name of the Korean nation hardened the firm pledge of Tangun's nation to foil Japan's moves for militarist revival through joint anti-Japanese struggle. It also called on all the Koreans to turn out in actions to this end.

articles.title: March 1 Popular Uprising of Koreans Staged against Japanese Aggressors
articles.content:
March 1 Popular Uprising of Koreans Staged against Japanese Aggressors
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The March 1 Popular Uprising in Juche 8 (1919) was an eruption of the Korean people's pent-up rage at the Japanese imperialists' fascist colonial rule over Korea. 
					 With a demonstration in Pyongyang as its start, the uprising swept across all the 13 provinces of the country, spreading even to the Korean compatriots elsewhere such as Manchuria, Shanghai, the Maritime Province of Siberia and Hawaii and thus becoming truly nationwide resistance. More than two million people joined in it in three months.
					
					 Upset by such developments, the Japanese imperialists began to quench the uprising with mobilization of all Japanese troops in Korea as well as six battalions and hundreds of military policemen hurled from the Japan proper.
					
					 Under the approval that they may kill the uprisers, they brutally murdered them.
					
					  In Seoul, a Japanese cavalry swooped on a throng of demonstrators, mangling to death a girl student who was shouting "Independence of Korea!"
					
					  More than 100,000 people were killed in the uprising. The monstrous killings of the uprisers clearly showed the inhumane nature of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Now the Japanese reactionaries have openly denied such hideous crimes Japan committed against the Korean people during its occupation of Korea, while inciting antagonism towards the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Korean residents in Japan over the measures taken by the DPRK in defence of its dignity and security.
					
					 This is tantamount to encroachment upon the DPRK's sovereignty and an undisguised challenge to justice. 
					
					 The DPRK people will certainly make Japan pay dearly for its past crimes.

articles.title: Tok Islets Are Inalienable Territory of Korea
articles.content:
Tok Islets Are Inalienable Territory of Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Recently, an old Japanese secondary school textbook dealing with Tok Islets, an inalienable part of Korea's territory, has been opened to the public, drawing interest of people at home and abroad.
					 The textbook, issued by the Japanese Meiji Publishing House on Oct. 1, 1924, contains a "Battle Chart in the Sea of Japan" picturing a sea battle during the Russo-Japanese War.
					
					 With an explanation that Japan's warship No. 4 played a flagship in the battle fought at around 10:00 May 28, 1905, the textbook says in its toponym index that the Tok Islets belong to Korea.
					
					 As seen above, Tok Islets are an inviolable part of Korea's territory nobody can deny.
					
					 Korea was the first to discover the islets and annex them to its territory. It is none other than Korea that re-confirmed and declared its ownership over the islets in line with international law.
					
					 This stark fact has already been verified.
					
					  In May 2009, an international workshop on the ownership of the islets was held in the United States.
					
					 At the workshop, a professor of Hawaii University said that there are data documenting the islets as territory of Silla Dynasty (early mid-1st century A.D. to 935 A.D.), one of the Three Kingdoms in Korea's history. Maps, printed in Japan in the period of the 1700s-1800s, too, evidence that the islets belong to Korea, the professor added. The professor said Japan began to claim their ownership in 1905, adding its claim lacked historical evidences and reasons.
					
					 The fact that Tok Islets belong to Korea's territory was already evidenced by Japanese maps and books which were published before the end of the 19th century. They include a copy of the military map made by a Japanese commander, Hisakuni Kawagami, on the instruction of warlord Toyotomi Hideyoshi in the period of the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598), the original map on eight provinces of Korea drawn by a Japanese geographer, Shihei Hayashi, in 1785 and a book released by the Japanese Foreign Ministry in 1896.
					
					 This goes to prove that Japan had long considered the islets to be a part of Korea's territory.
					
					 Japan's persistent claim to the islets is no more than a challenge to Korea's sovereignty.
					
					 Some days ago, the Japanese reactionaries dispatched a high-ranking government official to the "celebrations of Takeshima (Tok Islets) Day" sponsored by Shimane Prefecture of Japan and the Japanese foreign minister called for "dominium" over Tok islets in his recent diplomacy speech.
					
					 Now the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea hardly repress their surging wrath and hatred for the Japanese reactionaries who are persistently seeking to grab the islets, far from making an apology and reparation for the hideous crimes Japan committed against the Korean nation in the past.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should be mindful that its territorial ambition is a daydream.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Paektusan Prize closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here Friday. It opened on Feb. 5 to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team placed first in the basketball games (Group A). 
					
					 Men players of the Amnokgang Sports Team and women players of the April 25 Sports Team won in volleyball games (Group A).
					
					 Men players of the April 25 Sports Team and women players of the Amnokgang Sports Team took the lead in the table-tennis games (Group A) and men players of Sobaeksu Sports Team and women players of the Sajabong Sports Team in the alpine skiing. 
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned and sportspersons.

articles.title: Degree-holders of Taekwon-Do on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Degree-holders of Taekwon-Do on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The number of degree-holders of Taekwon-Do, traditional martial arts of Korea, has grown among amateurs in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, reaching tens of thousands at present.
					 At the 18th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions held in Pyongyang some time ago, many participants in the Taekwon-Do event, including those from the Overseas Construction Guidance Bureau, demonstrated their good skills.
					
					 Popularization of Taekwon-Do has taken on a higher level in the country since Juche 94 (2005).
					
					 Tens of rounds of Taekwon-Do courses were organized and a large number of people applied for the examinations to be qualified for the degree. They are now playing a key role in popularizing Taekwon-Do in their residential areas. 
					
					 Health-promoting practice of Taekwon-Do has been also encouraged in the country, along with practice for elders.

articles.title: Poster Exhibition Features Korean Army's Heroic Spirit
articles.content:
Poster Exhibition Features Korean Army's Heroic Spirit
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A poster exhibition is going on at the April 25 House of Culture here from mid-January, drawing a large number of visitors.
					 On display there are more than 40 posters created by artists of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 The appealing posters represent the DPRK servicepersons' spirit of devotedly defending the leader and their indomitable mettle.
					
					 Among them are posters "Let us bring about a fundamental turn in strengthening our armed forces and rounding off the combat preparedness this year marking the 50th anniversary of the advancement of the slogan 'A-match-for-a-hundred' by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung!" and "Let us greet the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War with signal achievements in increasing the combat capabilities of the KPA units!" which show the firm determination of the servicepersons to carry through the militant tasks set forth by respected  Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					
					 Poster "Mete out merciless punishment!" well depicts the unshakable will of the powerful Paektusan army to deal a crushing blow to the U.S. and its followers who took issue with the DPRK over its recent satellite launch and nuclear test.
					
					 Some of the exhibits vividly show the servicepersons' fighting spirit of annihilating the enemy and strongly appeal to them to get fully prepared for any modern warfare.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Crackdown upon Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Crackdown upon Chongryon Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on Feb. 25 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The statement accused the Japanese conservative government of taking such dastardly action as excluding the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools and suspending the payment of subsidies to Korean schools under the pretext of the DPRK's nuclear test.
					
					 It also conducted search operations against Korean businessmen in Japan and their enterprises and let right-wing gangsters make all sorts of threats and intimidations against Chongryon and Korean schools, the statement noted, adding:
					
					  Japan's ultra-right forces seeking the revival of militarism instituted the "Takeshima Day" in an attempt to rub salt into the wounds of the Korean nation again. 
					
					 The Korean people's pent-up grudge can never be settled unless the Japanese authorities admit their past wrongdoings and make sincere apology for this. They had better stop their rash actions, mindful of this.
					
					 They should stop at once the crackdown upon Koreans in Japan and lift their discriminating steps.
					
					 The world conscience will never pardon Japan's military ambition.
					
					 The ultra-right forces should bear in mind that they are bound to drink a bitter cup of defeat if they persistently pursue militarism in violation of the sovereignty of the Korean nation despite the DPRK's warning.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Pro-reunification Organization under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Pro-reunification Organization under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea released a statement on Feb. 26 denouncing the puppet regime's crackdown upon the organization.
					 The statement said that the Inchon District Prosecutor's Office made a non-restraint prosecution of the secretary general of the organization who doubles as co-representative of the Inchon People for Achieving Peace and Reunification on charges of violation of the ill-famed "Security Law".
					
					 The prosecution authorities took this action against the organization, groundlessly asserting that its opposition to war drills and call for the conclusion of a peace treaty, the pullback of the U.S. forces and the abrogation of alliance with the U.S. were made according to the "instruction of the north."
					
					 The statement held: The call for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces was made by the Armistice Agreement and the resolution adopted at UN General Assembly. The prosecution authorities' talk about the "instruction" from someone is nothing but sheer sophism to secure a pretext for suppressing the organization by deliberately linking it with the north.
					
					 The statement urged the prosecution authorities to stop at once the crackdown upon the organization struggling for independent and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Japanese Right-wing Forces' Repressive Campaign Assailed in South Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Right-wing Forces' Repressive Campaign Assailed in South Korea
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- 38 civic organizations of south Korea including the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps held a press conference in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Feb. 27.
					 They denounced the right-wing forces of Japan for denying the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army enforced in the past and suppressing the campaign for its solution.
					
					 Speakers in the conference accused the right-wing forces of Japan of repeating the reckless remarks made by the mayor of Osaka in August last year that there was no evidence proving that Korean women were taken away by soldiers of the Imperial Japanese Army by violence and threat. They went on:
					
					 Japanese police disturbed the rally held in Japan in protest against the outbursts of the mayor and in demand of a solution to the issue of sexual slavery. Not content with this, the police conducted search operations against the offices and houses of civic organizations and human rights activists involved in the rally.
					
					 The speakers blasted the Japanese government for persistently denying the past sexual slavery, dreaming of the revival of militarism.
					
					 This government's attitude is fanning up the right-wing forces' reckless remarks and repressive campaign, they noted, demanding a halt to its suppression of the citizens' movement for a solution to the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					 South Korea, too, should pressurize Japan to fulfill its legal responsibility in strong reaction to reckless remarks denying the sexual slavery and repressive campaign in Japan, they held.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Halt to Anti-North War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Halt to Anti-North War Drills
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification Thursday held a press conference in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul in protest against U.S.-south Korean Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war exercises.
					 Speakers there held that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle were offensive exercises as they are aimed at occupying the whole areas of the north under the simulated conditions of "contingency" in it.
					
					 The large-scale war drills to be kicked off against the backdrop of the daily escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula would only spark a military conflict, they warned.
					
					 They urged the warlike forces to immediately halt the war drills for aggression and the anti-DPRK "sanctions" racket.
					
					 Declaring that they would stage various actions against the war drills, they called upon citizens to positively join in them.
					
					 Similar press conferences took place in major cities of south Korea including Pusan and Kwangju on the same day.

articles.title: Public Bodies of Foreign Countries Back DPRK's Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Public Bodies of Foreign Countries Back DPRK's Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo and the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Austria issued statements in support of the DPRK's nuclear test.
					 The group of Democratic Congo in its statement on Feb. 19 said that the DPRK demonstrated once again the might of the country before the whole world through the recent underground nuclear test and proved the truth that the path of independence to be followed by the people can never be blocked. The statement went on:
					
					 Expressing full support for the DPRK's nuclear test which instilled great strength and courage to the world progressives aspiring after independence, we bitterly condemn the reckless remarks of the U.S. and its allies terming the recent nuclear test "a serious provocation to the international community".
					
					 The world should have judged the U.S., the arch criminal that compelled the Korean people to have access to nukes and the center for the development of nukes.
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its troops from south Korea at an early date after rolling back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK so that Korea may be reunified peacefully.
					
					 The UN Security Council should withdraw its reckless "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at once and stand against the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. so as to make a substantial contribution to the peace and security of the world.
					
					 The group of Austria said in its statement on Feb. 22:
					
					 We condemn the U.S. and its allies for crying out for taking measures to slap "sanctions" against the DPRK over its nuclear test.
					
					 We, at the same time, bitterly denounce the application of the double-standards to the DPRK as a wanton violation of international law.
					
					 We will positively support all the measures to be taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Senior Official of Russian Political Party Hails DPRK's Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Senior Official of Russian Political Party Hails DPRK's Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kalashnikov, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is first vice-chairman of the State Duma's International Affairs Committee, posted on a website a commentary hailing the DPRK's underground nuclear test on Feb. 13.
					 He said:
					
					 The reason why the DPRK was compelled to conduct the nuclear test is very clear.
					
					 It was a product of the international community's attitude.
					
					 Any country could not but be concerned about its fate when thinking of what the U.S. and the West did against Yugoslavia, Iraq, Afghanistan, etc.
					
					 The DPRK is not sufficient in electricity and food, but it opted for an underground nuclear test.
					
					 It keenly realized that no one else but itself can give security assurances.
					
					 He said that he cannot help expressing sympathy with the stance of the country, when recalling the lesson taught by some countries, adding that had Russia failed to possess nukes, it would have been leveled to the ground like Yugoslavia.

articles.title: Lithuanian President Expresses Sympathy with DPRK's Efforts for Reunification
articles.content:
Lithuanian President Expresses Sympathy with DPRK's Efforts for Reunification
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- I express sympathy with the stand of the DPRK that the issue of the country's reunification should be settled by the Korean people themselves free from foreign interference.
					 Dalia Grybauskaite, president of Lithuania, said this to Pak Kwang Chol, DPRK ambassador to Lithuania, on Feb. 22.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 I hope that the DPRK will achieve success in the work for the wellbeing of the people and the socio-economic development in the future, too.
					
					 I expect that the cooperative relations between the two countries will develop on good terms.
					
					 Pak presented his credentials to the president of the country that day.

articles.title: Many "Sea of Blood"-style Operas Produced in Four Decades
articles.content:
Many "Sea of Blood"-style Operas Produced in Four Decades 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- 40 years have passed since general secretary Kim Jong Il made public the work "On Consolidating and Developing the Successes Achieved in Creating Revolutionary Operas". 
					 This historic concluding speech made by him on March 1, Juche 62 (1973), at the meeting for the study of the idea of President Kim Il Sung on literature and art related to creation of revolutionary operas serves as important guidelines as it indicates clear ways for the development of the Juche-oriented opera art. 
					
					 Since then many "Sea of Blood"-style operas have been created and the five revolutionary operas staged more than 7 000 times. 
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the revolutionary operas "Sea of Blood", "The Flower Girl", "Tell the Story, Forest" and "The Story of A Nurse" were successfully produced in a short span of time. And after the publication of the above-said work, opera "Song of Mt. Kumgang" was created to record in history the five revolutionary operas. 
					
					 They, run through with profound philosophy, teach the truth of the class struggle and revolutionary outlook on life. They indicate new ways for opera representation in a unique manner as they properly embody popular character and simplicity and introduce verse-songs, pangchang, dances and three-dimensional moving stage decor. These are valuable experience gained in the opera creation of Korean style. 
					
					 The production of the five revolutionary operas brought about a dramatic turn in the development of opera art. 
					
					 Operas on diverse themes including the revolutionary operas "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight", "Sea of Love" and "Under the Bright Sun" and folklore operas "The Tale of Chun Hyang" and "The Tale of Sim Chong" clearly showed progress made in the creation of "Sea of Blood"-style operas which reached a new phase. 
					
					 The North Hamgyong and Kangwon provincial art troupes and other local art troupes also created such revolutionary operas as "Morning Glow at Tuman Riverside" and "Women of Namgang Village". 
					
					 The successes made in the opera revolution served as a foundation for producing "Mountain Shrine"-style dramas and source of other new art forms including music and dance tale. 
					
					 The significance of the creation of "Sea of Blood"-style operas was brought into bolder relief in the new century. 
					
					 The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" is based on the successes made in the opera revolution. 
					
					 The Phibada (Sea of Blood) Opera Troupe adapted the Chinese famous classic story "A Dream of Red Mansions" and Chinese legend "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" into operas to be listed as flawless art pieces.  
					
					 The Russian classic opera "Evgeni Onegin" was represented by Korean artistes as a flawless art work. 
					
					 The 1 600th performance of the revolutionary opera "Sea of Blood" was given on its 40th anniversary of its premiere and the 1 500th performance of the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" was given since its start. Their history has proved the vitality of the Juche-oriented opera art glorified down through generations as masterpieces of the era. 
					
					 The revolutionary operas of the DPRK were staged in different countries of Asia, Europe and Latin America. 
					
					 The revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" was presented hundreds of times in more than 40 countries including Russia, Cuba, Italy and Japan.

articles.title: Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Praised as Great Revolutionary Idea
articles.content:
Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Praised as Great Revolutionary Idea
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is unanimously praised by progressive people as a great revolutionary idea in the era of independence.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article which says:
					
					 The Juche idea, an idea guiding the human cause of independence, would be unthinkable without its founder President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il comprehensively analyzed and reviewed the history of the working class struggle many years ago with his inborn rare ideological and theoretical wisdom.
					
					 In this course he clarified that the preceding theory could not give clear-cut answers to the issues raised by the modern times and came to the conclusion that only the Juche idea, revolutionary idea of the President, could become a guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He solemnly declared the Juche idea as Kimilsungism, the new unique idea which can go only with the august name of the President.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il stated:
					
					 It was an event of special mention in the human cause of independence that Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism.
					
					 He authored many works such as "On the Juche Idea," developing, reviewing and systematizing the Juche idea.
					
					 The Juche idea was rapidly disseminated worldwide and progressive people came to have a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for building a new world free from all sorts of oppression, binding, domination and subjugation.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's ideological and theoretical activities were very vast in their scope.
					
					 He developed the Songun idea based on the Juche idea, providing mankind with a treasured sword for winning a sure victory in the struggle for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chief of the Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism Study Group in Fermo of Italy said:
					
					  Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un formulated the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in his work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					
					 The revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is precious ideological and theoretical wealth not only for the Korean people but for the world progressive people struggling for socialism.
					
					 The participants in the inaugural meeting of the Japanese Society for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in an excited tone:
					
					 The great idea helps produce great people and usher in a great era. Only victory is in store for us advancing under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation carried an article in its organ.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, publicly recognized as the great revolutionary idea in the era of independence, was formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. This marked a historic event of great significance not only for the Korean people but for the progressive mankind fighting for independence and socialism.
					
					 Their idea is inseparably correlated and it is quite natural to name the idea Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an integral system of the idea, theory and method of Juche and clearly indicates the revolutionary theory, strategy and tactics.
					
					 The victory and honor of the Korean people have always been demonstrated, a proof of the validity and vitality of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated Worldwide
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated Worldwide
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- People's strong yearning for general secretary Kim Jong Il was expressed worldwide on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Foreign political parties, organizations, institutions and personages sent floral baskets and bunches of flowers to the DPRK missions in their countries. They included the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, trade companies of China, general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh, chairman and general secretary of the Nepal Council for World Affairs, general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, general secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, general secretary of the  People's Rally for  Socialism of Democratic Congo and the chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 Colorful events praising the feats of the peerlessly great men took place in different parts of the world in little over a month before and after the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 A ceremony for unveiling a tablet to honor Kim Jong Il was held at Gaban Hotel, Vladivostok City of Russia.
					
					 Kimjongilia shows were held at Dalian City, Liaoning Province of China, Sovetskaya Gaban region of Khabarovsk Territory and the Museum of Nakhodka City and a national seminar took place in Benin. Meetings, lectures, round-table talks, photo exhibitions and film shows were held under the sponsorship of governments, political parties, organizations and preparatory committees for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star in more than 80 countries and regions. 
					
					 Media of different countries widely introduced the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il, who provided an eternal foundation for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung' Korea and Kim Il Sung's nation and performed immortal feats in the human cause of independence. 
					
					 The Russian paper Argumenti I Fakti and the Zimbabwean paper Herald carried the short biography of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Foreign papers, magazines, TV broadcasting services and websites gave publicity to portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos on his revolutionary activities and articles titled "The great leader Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of humankind", "Illustrious commander of Songun" and "Feats performed in the cause of socialism". They included the Mongolian paper Mongolyn Medee, the Thai paper Xing San Daily, the German paper Rote Fahne, the Ugandan paper Sun Rise, the Hong Kong, China, magazine International Relations and the Mongolian MNCTV.
					
					 The above-said events that took place on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star clearly proved that Kim Jong Il is the great sun of Songun who is always alive in the hearts of all the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried articles on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Guinean newspaper Horoya on February 11 devoted one whole page to an article titled "Great man's life recorded in history" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing together with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, and grew to be a great revolutionary amid the severe storm of the revolution, the article noted that he wisely led the party, army and people, performing undying feats on behalf of the times and history.
					
					 It said that his life was the most brilliant one of the great revolutionary who traversed an unprecedented path, holding aloft the red flag, and the one of the peerless patriot who devoted all his life to the country and its people.
					
					 L'Avenir, the newspaper of Democratic Congo, on the same day allotted one whole page to articles titled "Outstanding thinker and theoretician", "A great master of leadership" and others under the headline "The Day of the Shining Star of the DPRK, tribute to the great leader Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling leader.
					
					 The articles praised the peerlessly great man for clearly indicating the road to be followed by the era and mankind with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and turning the DPRK into a political and ideological power and a military power.
					
					 Articles titled "Exploits performed in the socialist cause", "The national power of the DPRK" and others were posted on the Ukrainian internet paper Ovektyvnaya Gazeta on February 12.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Newspapers, Magazines
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Newspapers, Magazines
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers and magazines carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda on February 13 devoted one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo on his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The paper said in an article titled "The most important thing" that the greatest exploit he performed in the socialist cause was that he successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership.
					
					 It noted in an article titled "He who embodied the Songun politics" that he formulated the Songun revolutionary line, Songun politics as a strategic line, an invincible socialist political mode to be held fast to permanently as long as imperialism exists and its moves for aggression persist.
					
					 The Feb. 13-20 issue of the newspaper Khabarovski Ekspres devoted one whole page to a special write-up interwoven with photos on his revolutionary activities and articles introducing the immortal exploits he performed in building a thriving socialist nation and in the struggle to achieve Korean reunification and the efforts to develop the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 The internet magazine Hanber Journal carried articles praising his revolutionary career totally devoted to the country and its people, illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos on his revolutionary activities and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un from February 15 to 17.
					
					 Also posted on the magazine were videos showing that the service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the Day of the Shining Star as the greatest national holiday, as well as Korean songs like "Our General Is the Best" and "General Star".
					
					 Articles titled "Korea does what it is determined to do", "Tribute to Generalissimos" and videos introducing the DPRK were posted on the internet newspaper Yedinaya Korea and the internet magazine Mar 12 on February 13 and 14.

articles.title: Dennis Rodman y su comitiva recorren varios lugares de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Dennis Rodman y su comitiva recorren varios lugares de Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Dennis Rodman, ex jugador de NBA de Estados Unidos, y su comitiva estuvieron este viernes en el Acuario de Delfines de Rungna.
					 Se mostraron impresionados al escuchar las explicaciones de que el acuario se ha construido como moderna y original base cultural en el pintoresco islote Rungna.
					
					 En el salon del espectaculo, los huespedes pasaron alegres momentos presenciando la actuacion de delfines.
					
					 Ellos recorrieron ademas el Monumento a la Idea Juche y el Arco de Triunfo.

articles.title: Rodman parte de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Rodman parte de Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- El ex jugador de NBA de Estados Unidos, Dennis Rodman, salio el viernes de esta capital.
					 Le despidieron en el aeropuerto Son Kwang Ho, vicepresidente del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y otros funcionarios coreanos.

articles.title: Iniciada la plantacion de arboles en estacion primaveral
articles.content:
Iniciada la plantacion de arboles en estacion primaveral
 Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la plantacion de arboles para la estacion primaveral.
					 Con motivo del Dia de Reforestacion (2 de marzo), los trabajadores y los jovenes y ninos escolares de distintas localidades del pais se movilizaron unanimemente en esa labor patriotica para acondicionar la patria como paraiso socialista del pueblo con la decision de trabajar con el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Tuvieron lugar el dia primero en los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario de Mangyongdae y Munsubong, el Jardin Botanico Nacional y la arboleda del mismo jardin en esta capital los mitines de trabajadores agricolas, jovenes y ninos escolares, trabajadores y miembros de la Union de las Mujeres Democraticas de Corea para tomar la decision de contribuir a la reforestacion de todo el pais en acato al proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un sobre el acondicionamiento territorial del pais.
					
					 En los actos participaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, comites, ministerios y organos centrales, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, los jovenes y ninos escolares. 
					
					 En los actos hubo informes e intervenciones. 
					
					 Los oradores recordaron que el Presidente Kim Il Sung subio el 2 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche a la colina Moran junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk e instruyo sembrar muchos arboles en el territorio patrio. 
					
					 Continuaron que durante la inspeccion a una unidad del Ejercito Popular de Corea realizada en marzo del ano pasado, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un trasplanto con sumo cuidado un arbol instruyendo acondicionar como paraiso socialista el territorio patrio. 
					
					 Llamaron a todos a levantarse como un solo hombre en el movimiento de plantacion de arboles en la estacion primaveral con el fervor patriotico. 
					
					 Terminados los actos, los cuadros del partido y el Estado sembraron los arboles con los trabajadores y los jovenes y ninos escolares. 
					
					 Este dia, se realizaron actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: Oficiales y soldados de EPC juran ponerse a la cabeza de reforestacion de todo pais
articles.content:
Oficiales y soldados de EPC juran ponerse a la cabeza de reforestacion de todo pais
 Pyongyang, 1 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con el patriotismo de convertir el pais en un paraiso socialista reforestado, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea se pusieron a la cabeza de la plantacion de arboles para la estacion primaveral.
					 Tuvo lugar este viernes en la zona del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan el mitin de los uniformados del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares para materializar cabalmente la instruccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo, de que el EPC debe tomar la delantera de la reforestacion del pais.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Kim Kyok Sik, el primer viceministro Hyon Chol Hae y otros funcionarios del MINFAP, los militares del EPC y los cadetes de las academias a todos niveles.
					
					 Km Kyok Sik presento el informe y otros militares hicieron uso de la palabra.
					
					  Los oradores senalaron que en acato al proyecto del Presidente Kim Il Sung de construir la patria prospera, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento al EPC en la delantera del movimiento masivo por plantar los arboles.
					
					 El Mariscal, con el gran proyecto de la construccion territorial, hizo acondicionar a lo largo y ancho del pais las modernas almacigas y dirigio energicamente la labor para extender a todo el pais los cespedes de nueva especie.
					
					 Llamaron a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC a movilizarse como un solo hombre en la plantacion de arboles en acato al proposito del Mariscal.
					
					 Al termino del acto, los participantes trasplantaron con toda sinceridad los arboles en la zona del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
